articles.title: Head of WPK Delegation Meets Head of International Liaison Department of C.C., CPC
articles.content:
Head of WPK Delegation Meets Head of International Liaison Department of C.C., CPC
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is leading its delegation on a visit to China, had a talk with Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse in Beijing on Tuesday.
					 Ri Su Yong said that Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and aspiration of all the party members, service personnel and people of the DPRK at the historic Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Ri Su Yong informed the CPC side that Comrade Kim Jong Un in his report at the Seventh Congress of the WPK comprehensively reviewed the shining victories and successes achieved by the WPK, service personnel and people of the DPRK under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the period under review and indicated the strategic line and tasks for accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 Ri stressed that Comrade Kim Jong Un clarified the principled stand of the WPK to protect peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region by always adhering to the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 Song Tao extended once again warm congratulations to the WPK on its successful Seventh Congress and to Comrade Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK on behalf of the CPC.
					
					 The Chinese party and government firmly support the WPK and Korean people led by Chairman Kim Jong Un advancing along the road of development suited to their actual conditions and sincerely hope that they will successfully attain their grandiose goal set at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and achieve bigger successes in the socialist construction, he said, and went on:
					
					 The CPC highly values the traditional relations of friendship between China and the DPRK, the precious treasure provided and brought into bloom by the leaders of the elder generation of the two parties and two countries, and will further consolidate and  develop them to suit the new circumstances.
					
					 He asked Ri Su Yong to convey his sincere greetings to respected Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were members of the WPK delegation, the DPRK ambassador to China and members of the Central Committee of the CPC.
					
					 A banquet was given in honor of the WPK delegation on the same day.

articles.title: Congratulations to President-Elect of Philippines
articles.content:
Congratulations to President-Elect of Philippines
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Rodrigo Duterte on his election as president of the Philippines.
					 Kim wished him success in his responsible work for the country's development, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Iranian Foreign Ministry led by Vice Minister Ebrahim Rahimpour who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation 
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Iranian Foreign Ministry led by Vice Minister Ebrahim Rahimpour who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Iranian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Iranian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Iranian Foreign Ministry led by Vice Minister Ebrahim Rahimpour Wednesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family members, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved with much care.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Line and Policies for National Reunification Favored by Christian Federation Chief
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Line and Policies for National Reunification Favored by Christian Federation Chief
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kang Myong Chol, chairman of the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea, made public a statement on Wednesday in support of the line and policies for national reunification advanced by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 In his report made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un comprehensively clarified the validity and vitality of the line of independent reunification and proposals for national reunification set forth by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and laid down policies for holding high the banner of national independence and great national unity, ensuring durable peace on the Korean peninsula and realizing reunification by federal formula, Kang said.
					
					 He fully supported Kim Jong Un's line and polices for national reunification, convinced that they are the great programmes common to the nation which help realize at an early date the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the 80 million Koreans.
					
					 All the Koreans should pull down the barrier of division as soon as possible and pave a wide avenue to national reunification true to Kim Jong Un's line for national reunification, Kang noted, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop the unreasonable attitude of groundlessly denying our bold and sincere appeal, without deeply studying it, and take a big stride forward in mending the relations and opening up a new chapter of national reunification hands in hands with the north.
					
					 The Christians in south Korea and overseas Korean Christians should support Kim Jong Un's line for national reunification laid down with noble patriotism and positively turn out in the sacred cause of national reunification longed for by the entire nation.
					
					 The statement expressed expectation that international Christian bodies and Christian organizations of various countries desirous of peace, security and reunification of the Korean peninsula would extend support and solidarity to the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Wednesday received a message from Abdel Fattah alÔºçSisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, sincerely congratulating his election as chairman of the WPK amid deep trust.
					 The Egyptian president in the message highly appreciated the strong relations between the friendly two countries and two peoples, expressing the will to work hard to develop the good relations and boost the bilateral cooperation in all fields.
					
					 The Egyptian president sincerely wished Kim Jong Un big success in his work and the friendly people of the DPRK development and progress in line with their aspiration and further development of the special relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 18th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Multiple Rocket Launchers Presented to People's Army
articles.content:
Multiple Rocket Launchers Presented to People's Army
 Hamhung, June 1 (KCNA) -- "Sonyon" (child) multiple rocket launchers provided by the schoolchildren across the country through their do-good-thing movement were presented to the People's Army on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union.
					 A presentation ceremony took place at Hamhung Square on Wednesday.
					
					 Attending it were officials concerned, schoolchildren in Hamhung City and service personnel of the People's Army.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a speech to be followed by schoolchildren and a soldier of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Jon and other speakers said that the above-said multiple rocket launchers reflect the firm faith and warm patriotism of the schoolchildren across the country to build a socialist power on this land at any cost by carrying forward the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of the Songun revolution started in Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called upon the participants to acquire a wealth of knowledge and firmly train their bodies and minds through hard study, successful organizational life and sports activities and prepare themselves as soldiers of Kim Jong Un, bearing in mind that the warmest patriotism is expressed in defending the country.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the multiple rocket launchers left for KPA units amid the warm send off by schoolchildren and working people.

articles.title: Joint Friendship Meeting Held to Mark International Children's Day
articles.content:
Joint Friendship Meeting Held to Mark International Children's Day
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship meeting for marking the 66th anniversary of the June 1 International Children's Day was held at the Taesongsan Pleasure Park here Wednesday.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, children and women here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here, foreign children and women and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, in a speech warmly congratulated the children across the country and foreign children on the International Children's Day.
					
					 Thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un our children's future is rosy, she said, expressing belief that the children would stoutly grow up to be the sunflowers trusting and following him only and pillars of the future who are knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy.
					
					 Then followed colorful sports and amusement games between the "squirrel" team and the "hedgehog" team while a folk play of children was under way.
					
					 At the end of the games the participants spent a pleasant time, dancing and using amusement facilities.
					
					 Meanwhile, diverse events took place in provinces, cities and counties on the occasion.

articles.title: DPRK Makes Progress in River Improvement Project
articles.content:
DPRK Makes Progress in River Improvement Project
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A signal progress was made in river improvement project and bank-protecting forestation of the DPRK during the spring general mobilization for land administration.
					 According to data from the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, more than 600 km-long rivers were rearranged and 200 hectares of bank-protecting forests created throughout the country.
					
					 In North Phyongan Province, embankment project was completed in nearly 2 km-long section along the River Amnok to protect Sinuiju City from flooding.
					
					 Similar project was also carried out in various parts of South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kyongwon and Onsong counties of North Hamgyong Province created tens of hectares of bank-protecting forests respectively, along the bank of the River Tuman.

articles.title: Women's Premier Soccer League Ends
articles.content:
Women's Premier Soccer League Ends
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Women's premier soccer league of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games came to an end in the DPRK.
					 The Pyongyang Team took the first place in the first round (league matches) and the second in the second round (group league and knock-out matches), thus winning the title.
					
					 The runner-up is the Wolmido Team, which came first in the second round.

articles.title: Newspapers Call for Performing Heroic Feats in 200-day Campaign of Loyalty
articles.content:
Newspapers Call for Performing Heroic Feats in 200-day Campaign of Loyalty
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The 200-day campaign of loyalty is an expression of the strong spirit of the service personnel and other people of the DPRK to win a great victory one after another and make a big leaping progress forward with the indomitable and offensive revolutionary idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and the heroic grand advance of Songun Korea to attain earlier the big goal of building a socialist power with the strong power of self-development and in the Mallima speed, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Wednesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the very noble duty of all the service personnel and other people to open up the path of the new victory in building a socialist power by taking an active part in the 200-day campaign in the charging spirit.
					
					 The 200-day campaign of loyalty reflects the noble intention of the WPK to fully demonstrate the spirit of making signal innovations across the country and open up a bright prospect in carrying out the important tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK ahead of schedule by steadily expanding the successes until the end of the year by encouraging service personnel and other people to give fuller play to the stamina which they had shown in the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign.
					
					 Steadfast are the faith and will of the service personnel and other people to advance dynamically under the bright blueprint indicated by the great party and create shining miracles and heroic myth in the 200-day campaign.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should rise up in the 200-day campaign with an invincible confidence and beat more loudly the drum for continuous revolution and make great innovations on all fronts of building a socialist power.
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial calls upon all the people to carry out the national economic plan for this year unconditionally by conducting the dynamic 200-day campaign and thus further glorify the successes of the Seventh Congress of the WPK and make a breakthrough to victory in implementing the grand programme of the party for accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Warmongers of Their Absurd Military Act
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Warmongers of Their Absurd Military Act
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. started the so-called combined submarine drill in collusion with Japan and south Korea in the South Sea of Korea. This drill is being staged by way of making other forces join in it with the naval forces of the U.S., Japan and south Korea as the main force in the waters off Jinhae and around Jeju Island. It was reported that after the drill, all the forces that participated in it are to flock to the naval base on Jeju Island.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that the drill is a dangerous military act aimed at starting a new war against the DPRK at any cost by rounding off the triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is mulling invading the DPRK even by forming the triangular military alliance at any cost and counting on the might of the forces following it.
					
					 The U.S. combined submarine drill with Japan and south Korean puppet forces as the main force is prompted by such a strategic intention.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the drill is a link in the whole chain for rounding off the triangular military alliance and it aims at perfecting the method of invading the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to pressurize the DPRK with the constant saber-rattling and thus dominate the world but it is a daydream which can never come true.
					
					 On the contrary, it will lead the U.S. to ruin.
					
					 This is an advice and warning given by the DPRK to the U.S. which is resorting to the absurd military acts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stand by Side of Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stand by Side of Nation
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities do not conceal their uneasiness, getting nervous about the stand of Trump, Republican presumptive nominee, toward Korean policy these days. Because whenever he mentioned his foreign policy, he cited the issue of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea, talking about free ride for security. He complained that the U.S. is unilaterally spending money in south Korea, suffering losses for helping it. He declared he would let the south Korean authorities shoulder the whole burden of upkeep for the U.S. troops, when elected president. He even made such remarks that in case they object to his demand, he would withdraw the U.S. troops from south Korea and would not care about whether a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, stunning the south Korean lackeys who kowtow to the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are now at a loss whether to pay such huge upkeep for the U.S. forces in order not to court the displeasure of their American master or remain helpless for failing to meet his demand.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea and the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK are the root cause of unending pain resulting from the national division, escalating military tensions and danger of a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In order to ensure lasting peace on the peninsula and achieve independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans it is necessary to make the U.S. troops pull out of south Korea and put the earliest end to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better stop acting as stooges of outsiders and stand by the side of the nation, though belatedly.
					
					 If they have the true will to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and reunification, they should take the stand of national independence and respond to the patriotic proposal of the DPRK, though belatedly, not persistently doing harm to the fellow countrymen, backed by foreign forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Unreasonable Crackdown upon Teachers' Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Authorities' Unreasonable Crackdown upon Teachers' Union
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea issued a statement on May 30 denouncing the authorities for their unreasonable crackdown upon the Teachers Union. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The present regime was severely punished in the past general election for its tyranny against democracy, people's livelihood, peace and reunification. Nevertheless, it is kicking off crackdown upon the union without any reflection on it.
					
					 The regime outlawed the union and forced the full-time officials of the union to return to schools. And this time, it took a step to dismiss core members of the union under the pretext that they refused to meet its demand.
					
					 The majority of education inspectors demanded the withdrawal of the step in protest against the authorities' unreasonable behavior, but the regime filed a suit with prosecution on the charge of neglect of duty.
					
					 The statement expressed astonishment at the anachronistic crackdown by the present regime.
					
					 It urged the chief executive to immediately accept the will of the people, stop the unreasonable suppression of the union and rectify anachronistic acts.

articles.title: GIs in South Korea Censured for Evading Responsibility for Environmental Pollution
articles.content:
GIs in South Korea Censured for Evading Responsibility for Environmental Pollution
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Green Federation released a statement on May 30 censuring the U.S. imperialist  aggressor forces for arrogantly evading their responsibility for polluting environment, according to a south Korean newspaper.
					 Negotiations for the return of the U.S. military bases in Puphyong and Wonju are delayed recently due to the GIs side evading its responsibility for the environmental pollution, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The GIs side has gone so shameless as to turn down the demand for purifying the bases polluted by it.
					
					 Pollution of the above-said bases under negotiations is also serious.
					
					 The statement condemned the GIs side for delaying the negotiations by turning down the demand for purifying the polluted bases.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Protest S. Korean Authorities' Group Allurement and Abduction of DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Protest S. Korean Authorities' Group Allurement and Abduction of DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Young Korean people and women in Japan launched a protest action in Tokyo on May 30 to denounce the south Korean authorities for luring and abducting a group of DPRK citizens.
					 They gathered before the south Korean embassy in Tokyo by breaking through the tight police cordon. 
					
					 They bitterly condemned the south Korean authorities for unreasonably keeping a group of DPRK women in custody and forcing them to "defect" to the south after luring and abducting them in broad daylight and taking them to south Korea,
					
					 They said that intolerable is the unheard-of unethical act of daring challenge the dignified DPRK, mercilessly abusing the rights of the DPRK citizens and inciting the north-south confrontation.
					
					 Representatives of young Korean people and women read out a written protest and thrust it to the embassy.

articles.title: Spokesman for Federation of Koreans in U.S. Urge S. Korean Authorities to Accept DPRK's Proposal
articles.content:
Spokesman for Federation of Koreans in U.S. Urge S. Korean Authorities to Accept DPRK's Proposal
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on May 28 urging the south Korean authorities to accept the DPRK's proposal for dialogue.
					 The DPRK clarified that the issues of the nation and reunification should be settled through dialogue and negotiations without fail and made a series of proposals for dialogue with the south side for the improved inter-Korean relations, the statement recalled, and went on:
					
					 Overseas Koreans have great hope and expectation towards it.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities, far from responding the north's proposals, have perpetrated intentional military provocations, not content with denying the proposals.
					
					 Not only the north side but all Koreans in the south and abroad hope for north-south dialogue.
					
					 Then, why does the "government" of the south side only desperately oppose the dialogue desired by all Koreans?
					
					 All members of the nation know that it is necessary for the north and the south to meet irrespective of thought, ism and political view in order to avert a war and advance toward reunification.
					
					 The "government" of the south side should not chill the desire of the nation by committing impudent military provocations hostile to the compatriots in the north.
					
					 We strongly urge the "government" to accept the proposal of the north side.
					
					 National reunification is the desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The first phase for realizing it is just the north-south dialogue.
					
					 The "government" of the south side should never forget that the end of those going against the desire of all Koreans was always miserable.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Not Misjudge DPRK's Sincerity and Tolerance: Koreans in China
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Not Misjudge DPRK's Sincerity and Tolerance: Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on May 23 in which it supports an open letter of the DPRK National Defence Commission calling upon the south side to respond to the DPRK's positive and practical measures to tide over the present catastrophe in north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations and defuse military tension and the danger of conflict on the Korean peninsula.
					 The statement said that the DPRK's proposal for north-south military authorities' talks is a realistic measure for peace of the country and the security of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should decisively break with the shameful past and make a new start by accepting the resolute and practical measures for peace of the country and security of the nation, it said, and went on:
					
					 They should not misjudge the DPRK's sincerity and tolerance but behave wisely as befit members of the Korean nation.
					
					 But all Koreans are bitterly disappointed by the south Korean authorities' unreasonable behavior of denying the DPRK's broadminded and sincere appeal, without closely examining it, and standing in the way of national reunification, parroting the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 All Koreans are closely watching the attitude of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 All the members of the Liaoning Regional Association actively support the open letter of the DPRK National Defence Commission and will make all efforts for its realization together with the people in the homeland.

articles.title: Immediate Repatriation of DPRK Women Urged by Korean in China
articles.content:
Immediate Repatriation of DPRK Women Urged by Korean in China
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A vice chairperson of the Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on May 26.
					 The statement said that the south Korean authorities' heinous unethical terrorism is arousing bitter hatred and resentment of the officials of the regional association and Koreans in China.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' talks about "group defection from the north" and "free will" are no more than sheer sophism aimed to tarnish the image of the DPRK registering the world-startling successes one after another despite the U.S. and its followers' sanctions and cover up their shuddering unethical terrorism.
					
					 They are now leaving no means untried to force the abductees to "defect" through all sorts of appeasement, threat and blackmail, keeping them in solitary cells under the absurd pretext of "protecting their safety" for fear that their thrice-cursed group allurement and abduction might be disclosed to public.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the south Korean authorities to make an apology for their group allurement and abduction before the compatriots and the world, though belatedly, and send the women back to the DPRK without delay and severely punish the Intelligence Service and backstage manipulators involved in the crime.

articles.title: Russian Figures Support Just Cause of WPK
articles.content:
Russian Figures Support Just Cause of WPK
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Russian figures expressed full support for the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at the interview with a journalist of the internet news Svobodnaya Presa days ago.
					 Valery Rashukin, deputy to the State Duma and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said:
					
					 The DPRK values its sovereignty very much.
					
					 At the Seventh Congress of the WPK supreme leader Kim Jong Un clarified the validity of the independent foreign policy of the WPK and stressed the need to improve and normalize the relations with those countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and takes friendly approach to it.
					
					 To continuously boost the long-standing and good neighborly relations between Russia and the DPRK favors the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Prof. and Dr. Sergei Chernyahopski at Moscow State University said:
					
					 The DPRK is the most peace-loving country in the world.
					
					 At the Seventh Congress of the WPK leader Kim Jong Un said that as a responsible nuclear weapons state, the DPRK will not use a nuclear weapon first unless its sovereignty is encroached upon by any hostile forces for aggression with nuclear weapons, as it had already declared.
					
					 This is the very just saying, neither strange nor startling.
					
					 We know a little about the DPRK.
					
					 It is necessary to know deeply about the life and substantial scientific and technical successes made in this country as much as possible.
					
					 The DPRK is the only socialist country which did not undergo any upheaval when east European socialist countries including the former Soviet Union collapsed in the 1990s.
					
					 The DPRK is, indeed, a country from which we can learn many things.

articles.title: Indian Newspaper Supports Reunification of Korea by Federal Formula
articles.content:
Indian Newspaper Supports Reunification of Korea by Federal Formula
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Indian newspaper Rising Europe on May 27 carried an article titled "Federal formula is the unique way of reunifying Korea in a peaceful way".
					 The article said:
					
					 Under the present situation on the Korean peninsula federal formula is the only way of achieving national reunification peacefully in accordance with the will and desire of all the Koreans.
					
					 Federal formula is the way of reunification common to the Korean nation clarified in the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The north and the south adopted the historic June 15 joint declaration in which they acknowledged the commonness of the north side's low-stage proposal by federal formula and the south side's proposal by confederal formula and agreed to strive for reunification in this direction in the future.
					
					 The conservative ruling quarters in south Korea, however, are slandering the June 15 joint declaration and articles related to the reunification by federal formula specified in the joint declaration and totally denied its implementation, while reneging on the commitments they made to the Koreans and disregarding the sincere efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 To deny the idea and social system of the opposite side and seek unification by one side's idea and social system is no more than the expression of the intent not to reunify the country but to fight a war.
					
					 If the reunification by federal formula is achieved, the Korean nation will be able to establish the sovereignty in a nationwide scale and Korea will be glorified as an independent, peace-loving and prosperous reunified power.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con jefe de Departamento de Enlace Internacional de CC de PCCh
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con jefe de Departamento de Enlace Internacional de CC de PCCh
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ACNC) -- El miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Su Yong, quien preside la delegacion del PTC de visita en la Republica Popular China departio el dia 31 en la Casa de Huespedes Diaoyutai de Beijing con el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del Partido Comunista de China, Song Tao.
					En la ocasion, Ri Su Yong dijo que el VII Congreso del PTC eligio al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC en reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes.
					
					Informo que en el informe presentado ante el VII Congreso del PTC, el Mariscal hizo balance global de las brillantes victorias y exitos alcanzados por nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo durante el periodo de revision general bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y dilucido el lineamiento estrategico y las tareas de lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista.
					
					Ri subrayo que el Mariscal expuso la posicion de principios del PTC de defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region apoderandose siempre de la linea estrategica sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Song Tao expreso una vez mas las calurosas felicitaciones en nombre del PCCh por haberse efectuado con exito el VII Congreso del PTC y elegido el Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC.
					
					El partido y el gobierno de China apoyan con firmeza que el PTC encabezado por el companero Presidente Kim Jong Un y el pueblo coreano marchan infaliblemente por el camino de desarrollo conveniente a la condicion propia y les desean de todo corazon mayores exitos en la construccion del socialismo al alcanzar excelentemente la grandiosa meta definida por el VII Congreso del PTC, menciono.
					
					Afirmo que el PCCh presta suma importancia a las tradicionales relaciones de amistad China-Corea, preciosa riqueza preparada y cultivada por los lideres de la vieja generacion de los dos partidos y de los dos paises y las consolidara y desarrollara mas conforme al nuevo ambiente.
					
					El encomendo que le transmitiera su sincero saludo al Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el acto estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion del PTC, el embajador coreano en China y los miembros del CC del PCCh.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecio un banquete en honor de la delegacion del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente de Filipinas
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente de Filipinas
Pyongyang, primero de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio el 31 de mayo un mensaje de felicitacion a Rodrigo Dutertr, electo presidente de la Republica de Filipinas.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y le desea al destinatario los exitos en sus labores responsables para el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: Ninos escolares donan a EPC lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados
articles.content:
Ninos escolares donan a EPC lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados
Hamhung, primero de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea, fueron donados al Ejercito Popular de Corea los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados fabricados mediante el movimiento de trabajos utiles de los ninos escolares de todo el pais. 
					La ceremonia de donacion tuvo lugar este miercoles en la Plaza de Hamhung con la participacion de los funcionarios interesados, los ninos escolares de la misma ciudad y los oficiales y soldados del EPC. 
					
					Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung pronuncio palabras de donacion e intervinieron los ninos escolares y un militar del EPC. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que en los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados donados estan reflejados el ardiente patriotismo y la ferrea conviccion de los ninos escolares de todo el pais de levantar sin falta sobre el territorio patrio la potencia socialista prospera continuando generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun iniciada en la selva del Paektu, bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Destacaron que los ninos escolares, conscientes de que el autentico patriotismo es la defensa de la patria, deben hacer bien los estudios, la vida de organizacion y las actividades deportivas para prepararse como soldados del Mariscal.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los armamentos partieron hacia las unidades militares recibiendo la despedida de los ninos escolares y trabajadores.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas deben volver a lado de nacion, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas deben volver a lado de nacion, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, primero de junio (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias las autoridades surcoreanas no ocultan su inquietud prestando atencion a la posicion politica sobre Corea de Trump, candidato republicano a las elecciones presidenciales de Estados Unidos. Cada vez que se refiere a su politica exterior, Trump habla del problema de presencia de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea y la "teoria del viaje sin pago en el asunto de seguridad"
					Hace poco, el dijo descontentamente que EE.UU. "esta gastando unilateralmente el dinero en el Sur de Corea" y sufre perdidas a cambio de dar asistencia. Y declaro abiertamente que si el se elija como presidente, impondra a las autoridades surcoreanas el gasto completo por el estacionamiento de las tropas norteamericanas. Para colmo, recalco que si las autoridades surcoreanas no se acuerden con su demanda, retirara las tropas norteamericanas y no hara caso de la guerra que estallara en la Peninsula Coreana. Tales palabras dieron un gran pavor a las autoridades surcoreanas que consideran a EE.UU. como su amo.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia primero un comentario individual burlando a los surcoreanos que estan inquietados.
					
					La presencia de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea y la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea devienen el origen principal que perdura el dolor de division nacional y agranda la tension militar y la peligrosidad de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					A fin de asegurar la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la reunificacion independiente con la fuerza unida de los coreanos, tienen que retirar del suelo surcoreano las tropas norteamericanas y poner fin a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Sera mejor que las autoridades surcoreanas dejen de vivir como lacayos de las fuerzas foraneas y vuelvan al lado de la nacion.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen la verdadera voluntad de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y desean la paz y reunificacion, no deben atentar a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, sino tomar, aunque sea tarde, la posicion de la independencia nacional y sumarse a la propuesta patriotica hecha por la RPDC.
